var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("EP99Mjk5Bc5jInLnKfUgRaOo0oZmUANFRDmyf05uTx8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
}

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

a:bk.name,

c:java.timeFormat(new Date(bk.chapterUpdateTime).getTime()),
d:bk.wordNum,
e:bk.chapterName,
f:bk.intro,
g:bk.picture
};
})()

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

}

let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "ğŸ”’":""
    let pc_url = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let mob_url = `https://m.qidian.com/book/${bid}/${chapter.id}.html`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${mob_url},{'webView': true}` : pc_url
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\då·éƒ¨ç« èŠ‚å›.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´: ${chapter.uT} å­—æ•°: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

aList=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select('.chapter-list a')
list=[]
for(i in aList){list[i]={"title":String(aList[i].text()),"curl":aList[i].attr('href')}}
id=baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]
url="http://m.sixmh7.com/bookchapter/"
body="id="+id+"&id2=1"
option={"method":"POST","body":String(body)}
data=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))
for(i in data){list.push({"title":data[i].chaptername,"curl":"/"+String(id)+"/"+data[i].chapterid+".html"})}
list

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("DeYw7vSTuV9g2qTxNZqG5mB6").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>

        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' Â· ' +

  };
});

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result
